title: Font Id - LA Times last Sunday
content:
Hi I need help identifying this font that appeared in the LA Times mag last Sunday...”TV Room” article. A client of mine wants to use it...

Thanks!  
Anna

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081004023153im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fontc_3820.jpg)

 [‹ Irish Road Signs / Gaelic](http://web.archive.org/web/20081004023153/http:/typophile.com/node/44691 "Go to previous forum topic") [Flaunt magazine font id ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081004023153/http:/typophile.com/node/44682 "Go to next forum topic")
author: annainla

comments.content: The text is Helvetica, possibly... The big type is Neutraface, from House Industries!
